short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Track, organize, and summarize your AliExpress orders efficiently. View shipping details and stay updated with ease.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Effortlessly manage your AliExpress orders with this user-friendly Chrome extension. Track shipping updates, view order statuses, and summarize your order detailsâ€”all within one compact dashboard.

How to Use:

Open AliExpress Orders Page: Start by opening your AliExpress orders page in one tab.
Launch the Extension: Click the extension icon in your browser toolbar to access the dashboard.
Start Scraping: Click the "Start Scraping" button in the extension popup. The extension will automatically gather all order details from the open AliExpress orders page.
Fetch Tracking Details: After scraping, click the "Fetch Tracking Numbers" button to retrieve the latest tracking numbers for your packages.
View & Organize Your Orders: Your orders will be grouped by tracking numbers, providing a clear and organized view of their current status, product details, and tracking information.
Benefits:

Quick & Easy Access: Save time by consolidating all your AliExpress order information in one view, without manual searching.
Organized Information: Manage and track your orders effortlessly, view their statuses, and access key details quickly.
Perfect for All Users: Whether you're a casual AliExpress shopper or managing a dropshipping business, this extension is designed to keep you organized.
